Test Name: Cobalamin (Vitamin B12), Methionine, and Methylmalonic Acid, Serum
Purpose: Quantitative measurement of serum cobalamin, methionine, and methylmalonic acid to assist in diagnosing and managing vitamin B12 deficiency, metabolic disorders, and related conditions.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or plain red-top tube without anticoagulant
Equipment: Liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometer (LC-MS/MS) or equivalent validated instrument
